@ZanShow I was just going to send you this! so good!
@ZanShow always both!
@goldstoneandrew anyway LOTS of cool stuff. let's carry on chatting by email :)
@goldstoneandrew i guess also a question of what is expanding - reading material available or number of titles published in US domestically?
@goldstoneandrew anyway re: sharing let me get my data in order and i'll start by adding what i have specifically for fiction up to 22
@goldstoneandrew trying to think of who else might have similar material to add - will write to Simon Eliot, anyway...
@goldstoneandrew mostly do with the PW vs. the PC's way of counting perhaps?
@goldstoneandrew yes, for sure! so interesting (and weird) that the expansion doesn't show in the US figures but does in the UK
@goldstoneandrew most of my stuff is later though, 1918-45...am assuming you're stopping at 22 for copyright reasons?
@goldstoneandrew This is so great! I am (obviously) interested & have stuff to add from British Publishers' Circular 1918-22
